name: Ready to Drink! - Cool game
description:
Cut the ingredients on the table well and drop them into the mixer below!
If you can drop enough in the mixer, you'll have delicious juice!
If you change the cutting location, you cannot drop the ingredients.
Since the number of cuts is not fixed, let's drop it without rushing!

There are also some ingredients that you can't imagine what juice will be!
Fun after cutting!
